instructions: Open Settings from the home screen. Tap Display . Toggle Dark at the top to switch to dark mode. How to enable dark mode on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central Tap Dark mode settings to customize dark mode on your S20. Toggle Turn on as scheduled to On if you want to schedule dark mode from sunset to sunrise. If you want dark mode enabled all the time, leave this setting off. How to enable dark mode on the Galaxy S20 Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central
